note:
Technopeasant in a mini-homestead, 8b and Salish Sea.

Computing and information. System and structure. Permaculture and poetry. Games and rules. silence / noise

  Text in the avatar: "The forest was shrinking but the trees kept voting for the axe, for the axe was clever and convinced the trees that because his handle was made of wood he was one of them."

he / him / they / person
